trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event occurs when a smart tag panel is displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>hendelsen oppstår når et smartkort koden panel vises eller skjules.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: This event is not generated directly by the panel but rather by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen genereres ikke direkte fra panelet men heller ved den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>klasse når den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>metoder kjøres.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter always references the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the panel is associated with.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>hendelsen den `relatedObject` parameteren alltid refererer til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName>som panelet er tilknyttet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the panel.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som er knyttet til panelet.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir om panelet blir vises eller skjules.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Henter et flagg som indikerer om smartkort kode panelet er som vises eller skjules.

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being hidden through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis panelet er skjult via et kall til <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>metoden, egenskapen har en verdi for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being shown through a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis panelet vises via et kall til <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, denne egenskapen har en verdi for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType"></xref> that indicates the state of the panel.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType"> </xref> som angir tilstanden til panelet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that is associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Henter objektet som er knyttet til smartkortet koden panelet.

trans-unit.source: The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RelatedObject aktiverer i programmer å knytte et objekt til en forekomst av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This object then is available to methods that handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er deretter tilgjengelig for metoder som behandler den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> associated with the smart tag panel.
